Correlate these events with parent processes and user accounts initiating the commands. Use statistical analysis to identify outliers in terms of user accounts running these commands or frequency of execution.

Presence of Windows Event ID 4720 indica.Action: Collect and analyze Windows Event ID 4720 logs across all servers and endpoints.
